title: Can I tun my orange essence back to the skin shard?
body:
I wasn't paying attention and accidentally disenchanted a skin for a champion I had just bought. Is there a way I can get the shard back? I really want the skin.
Thanks.

replies.body: It mainly just depends on how long ago it happened and if the essence you got from it had been used already. I'd be sure to submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) letting them know which shard it was and they'll take a look!
